subject: New York City Marathon
Handicapped
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: There were 78 cyclists who volunteered to ride alongside the wheelchair and handcycle racers to prevent pedestrians and motorists from wandering onto the course and into the athletes’ way.
snippet: There were 78 cyclists who volunteered to ride alongside the wheelchair and handcycle racers to prevent pedestrians and motorists from wandering onto the course and into the athletes’ way.
